result.title: Dover Continues To Impress; Reiterate Buy
result.text: Dover (DOV) delivered a strong Q3 2025, outperforming expectations, and I reiterate my BUY rating with an increased price target of $210. DOV's diversified segments, especially Clean Energy & Fueling and Pumps & Solutions, are driving growth, while Engineering Products and Climate & Sustainability Technologies face headwinds. Recent acquisitions, notably Sikora, are exceeding synergy expectations, supporting the electrification and data center trends fueling DOV's future growth.
